$ ick run --json
{
    "results": {
        "do_nothing": [
            {
                "project_name": "",
                "status": "success",
                "modified": [],
                "message": "did nothing\n"
            }
        ],
        "fail": [
            {
                "project_name": "",
                "status": "error",
                "modified": [],
                "message": "AssertionError\n"
            }
        ],
        "move_a": [
            {
                "project_name": "",
                "status": "needs-work",
                "modified": [
                    {
                        "file_name": "file_a.cfg",
                        "diff_stat": "-3"
                    },
                    {
                        "file_name": "file_b.toml",
                        "diff_stat": "+3"
                    }
                ],
                "message": ""
            }
        ]
    }
}
